policies.text: Check-out before 11:00 AM

• Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation
  • This property accepts credit cards and cash
  • Cashless transactions are available
  • Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher and a first aid kit
Guests will receive an email 24 hours before arrival with check-in instructions. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

• One child 5 years old or younger stays free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding.
  • Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms.
  • Cashless payment methods are available for all transactions.
  • Contactless check-out is available.

You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property:

  • A tax is imposed by the city: AED 15.00 per accommodation, per night

We have included all charges provided to us by the property.

• Fee for cooked-to-order breakfast: approximately AED 72 per person
  • Airport shuttle fee: AED 157.50 per vehicle (one-way)
  • Uncovered self parking fee: AED 50.00 per night
  • Late check-out fee: AED 250 (subject to availability)

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.
We don't guarantee an Extra Bed for Extra guests, it is subject to availability of the hotel and may be chargeable as well.
